sentences.sentence: He thinks that being a close loser might give people a psychological boost, or the proverbial kick in the pants.
sentences.translation: 他认为，惜败可能会给人们一种心理上的刺激，或者如谚语所说的“重大挫折”。

sentences.sentence: In the advance of the movement, the humorous saying has acquired a proverbial currency, "Quitting smoking is the easiest thing world. I've done it hundreds of time."
sentences.translation: 在这一运动的推进中，幽默的说法众所周知：“戒烟是世界上最容易的事，我已经做过几百次了。”
他们的热情好客人人皆知。
